com.aurel.track.report.datasource

Interface TimePeriodDatasource.PERIOD_TYPE

  • Enclosing class:
    TimePeriodDatasource

    public static interface TimePeriodDatasource.PERIOD_TYPE
    Many datasources can be configured such that they consider only a certain time interval, for example the last 60 days, or alternatively an interval specified by a start and an end date.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CURRENT_MONTH
      Current month
      static int DAYS_BEFORE
      This time interval is defined by the current date as end date, and x days back as a start date.
      static int FROM_TO
      This time interval is defined by a start date and an end date.
      static int LAST_MONTH
      Last month
